list.name: React/Redux
list.descr: Nowadays I work actively with vanilla ES2016+, React/Redux. I write a lot of pet-projects on React/Redux.

list.name: SASS (CSS preprocessing)
list.descr: I develop on SASS according to the BEM methodology (it refers only to the names of the classes). Besides that, I use styled components.

list.name: PostgresSQL
list.descr: I have experience in websites development with individual structure of relational DB.

list.name: NoSQL
list.descr: I tried to use MongoDB for pet-projects.

list.name: Python
list.descr: I had experience on websites development on native Python, using Django.

We had two bags of wordpress, seventy-five pellets of free html5 templates...
Not that we needed all that for the freelance, but once you get locked into a serious web-sites collection, the tendency is to push it as far as you can Â©
